General.Name: San Leon Energy plc
General.Description: San Leon Energy plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas properties. Its flagship property is the OML 18 covering an area of approximately 1,035 square kilometers located in the Southern Niger Delta in Nigeria. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.

3.Name: Mr. Finian Alan Campbell
3.Title: Director of Commercial & Bus. Devel. and Company Sec.
